amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease funding for the Economic Development Administration by $90 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 18 in the Congressional Record of September 9, 1997 to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for the Economic Development Administration's trade adjustment assistance program by $90 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 107 - 305 (Roll no. 455).
